Question
========

A researcher administers a depression questionnaire to 35 women and 13 men. The men score an average of 15 (SD=10), and the women 16 (SD=20); it is also known that the residual squared ("Within-groups SS") is equal to 14800. What can be said about the effect size of the difference between men and women? 
Answerlist
----------
* D = 0.067; this effect is in the interval small to medium.
* D = 0.067; this effect lies in the interval medium to large.
* D = 0.056; this effect lies in the interval small to medium.
* D = 0.056; this effect lies in the interval medium to large.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Correct
